code: var CHARACTERSLIST='https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/?page=19';var SINGLECHARACTER='https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/';var fetchCharacters=function fetchCharacters(){return fetch(CHARACTERSLIST).then(function(response){return response.json();});};var fetchCharacterId=function fetchCharacterId(id){return fetch(SINGLECHARACTER+id).then(function(response){return response.json();});};export{fetchCharacters,fetchCharacterId};
